name: Hoppify
description:
Hoppify is an apparently easy game, where the goal is to learn how to overcome its obstacles and level up. With each level, the difficulty gradually increases, but the goal remains the same: avoiding the white obstacles while trying to reach the end of the game scene. 

The game was inspired by a viral video on TikTok with a cat trying to make its way through a bunch of plastic cups placed strategically by her owner. You can have a look at the video here
